jobDescription: We are people against dirty® (PAD), and we’ve always done things differently. We are fearless thinkers, mad scientists and adventurous designers who believe that making soap leads to brave ideas, bold inventions and beautiful bubbles.  We are small, but we have big plans to make the world a cleaner, greener, more colorful place. And we invite everyone to join us as we pioneer a future where doing business is doing good for all. THE ROLE Based in San Francisco and reporting to the People Operations Manager, this role is responsible for the more financial side of the people equation as a key link between the People + Environment (P+E) and Finance teams. This role will be responsible for full-cycle payroll and benefits administration. Beyond the traditional boundaries of HR, we want to ensure that work life at method is driving the greatest value for our people and for the company. This position provides an amazing opportunity to both learn about and influence our culture.
